block.p: McKIERNAN-Frank. On October 8, 2000. Native of Swanlinbar, Co. Cavan, Ireland. Beloved husband of Margaret (nee Flatley). Loving father of Joan, Frank & Kathleen McKiernan Blackman. Dear brother of Peter, Sean, and Thomas Gabriel; all of NY and Bridget Lenihan of Dublin, Ireland. Adoring grandfather of four and great grandfather of one. Cherished father-in-law of Georgia, Ed Maloney and Ian Blackman. Reposing Wednesday and Thursday 2-4 and 7-9 PM at Riverdale-on-Hudson Funeral Home, 6110 Riverdale Avenue, Bronx. Mass of Christian Burial Friday 10AM, at St. Margaret of Cortona Church. Interment Gate of Heaven Cemetery.
